genresAdvancedInfo.name: south african metal
genresAdvancedInfo.description: South African metal is a heavy and aggressive music genre that combines elements of traditional metal with African rhythms and melodies. It often features powerful vocals, intricate guitar riffs, and fast-paced drumming. The lyrics are often politically charged and address issues such as social injustice and inequality. Bands such as Mind Assault, Facing the Gallows, and Zombies Ate My Girlfriend are popular in the South African metal scene.
